document.full_text: the human rights council, voting 22 to 7, approved a resolution co-sponsored by the united states and sweden to appoint special rapporteur on iran.
document.title: u.n. rights council backs investigator on iran
lines_and_colors: the human rights council, voting 22 to 7, approved a resolution co-sponsored by the united states and sweden to appoint special rapporteur on iran.
